title: Fizz too good sometimes?
body:
At this point of the game, FIZZ IS TOO GOOD. This is really annoying for me as I am a beginner at LoL so it  cvis really annoying when people flay as Fizz in a 
Co-Op vs AI beginner match and completely take all the kills and do it all for you and take the difficulty of it. If you are one of these people please could you not do it, just play PvP and not ruin it for us. Thanks

replies.body:
Fizz is cancer, I used to play him, you get fed? Just roflstomp botlane.
You get shit on? Just roflstomp botlane.

Then do whatever you want.

And if you really care about kills in bots, I'd suggest uninstalling this game, just because nobody wants to see a wanker spamming "omg ks give me kills", because once you move to PvP it will get only worse.
Not really. In norms he's quite alright. Just play a counter. I don't really know myself cause i dont like or main fizz, but if u search him up...
